metadata.title: CVE-2021-20228 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine 2.9.18, where sensitive info is not masked by default and is not protected by the no_log feature when using the sub-option feature of the basic.py module. This flaw allows an attacker to obtain sensitive information. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
